text: Gletterens is a municipality of the district Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It is home to the Les Gr√®ves prehistoric pile-dwelling (or stilt house) settlements that are part of the Prehistoric Pile dwellings around the Alps UNESCO World Heritage Site.UNESCO World Heritage Site - Prehistoric Pile dwellings around the Alps == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Broye
title: Gletterens
